title: Chhath Puja Celebration
description: Annual celebration of Chhath Puja with traditional rituals and songs. Join us for this sacred festival dedicated to the Sun God and Chhathi Maiya. Experience authentic cultural traditions, devotional songs, and community feast.

title: Cultural Night 2025
description: An evening showcasing folk dances, songs, and regional cuisine from UP, Bihar, and Jharkhand. Experience the vibrant cultural heritage through traditional performances, live music, and authentic regional delicacies.

title: Holi Festival of Colors
description: Celebrate the festival of colors with music, dance, and traditional sweets. Join us for a vibrant celebration filled with organic colors, dhol beats, and delicious gujiya and thandai.

title: Annual General Meeting 2025
description: Join us for our annual general meeting to discuss upcoming events, community initiatives, and cultural programs. Your participation and feedback are valuable to us.
